means: poem ： 通常指一首诗或诗体文。
verse ： 多指诗句、诗行或诗节，也可作诗歌、韵文的总称。

sentence.Network_en: I have been moved to write a few lines of verse.
sentence.Network_cn: 我因感动而写下了几句诗。

sentence.Network_en: He published only three slim volumes of verse in his short life.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他短暂的一生里，他只出版过3卷薄薄的诗集。

sentence.Network_en: The verse rose up to fire his breast with inspiration.
sentence.Network_cn: 这首诗激发了他的灵感。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English fers, from Latin versus 'a turn of the plough, a furrow, a line of writing', from vertere 'to turn'; reinforced in Middle English by Old French vers, from Latin versus

entry.def: Verse is writing arranged in lines which have rhythm and which often rhyme at the end.

example.ex: I have been moved to write a few lines of verse.
example.tran: 我因感动而写下了几句诗。

entry.tran: 诗节;诗行；（歌曲的）段落;（《圣经》、《古兰经》等中的）节
entry.def: A verse is one of the parts into which a poem, a song, or a chapter of the Bible or the Koran is divided.

example.ex: This verse describes three signs of spring...
example.tran: 这节诗描绘了春天来临的三个征兆。

example.ex: The choir has sung only two verses of the last hymn.
example.tran: 合唱团只唱了最后一首赞美诗的两个段落。

means.word_mean: 1. compose verses or put into verse;
2. familiarize through thorough study or experience;

auth_sentence.content: However, that verse is true--in context.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, that verse is true--in context.

auth_sentence.content: YOU advise anyone to check translation in this verse.
auth_sentence.res_content: YOU advise anyone to check translation in this verse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: YOU advise anyone to check translation in this verse.

auth_sentence.content: Verse and food rituals do have a strange affinity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Verse and food rituals do have a strange affinity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Verse and food rituals do have a strange affinity.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad向+vers转+e→转向不利的
a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
di分开+vers转+e→转开了→不同的
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per始终+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
re反+vers转+e→反转的
reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 横向的, 横断的, 截线的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍的, 全体的, 通用的, 宇宙的, 世界的
stems_affixes.word_buile: universe[n.宇宙,万物]+al表形容词→宇宙的→普遍的, 全体的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vers转+atile→玩得转,有才能的
vers转+ed……的→转过的,已经熟练了→熟练的
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ary人→n.对手,敌手
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ity表名词→n.不幸,灾难
anni=ann+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
averse[adj.厌恶的,反对的]+ion表名词→n.嫌恶,憎恨
converse[v.谈话,交谈,认识]+ation表名词→n.会话,谈话
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
con共同+vers转+ion表名词→n.转变,转换;信仰的改变

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转向,转移;牵制;解闷;娱乐
stems_affixes.word_buile: di离开+vers转+ion表名词→转偏离→转向
diverse多样的+ity表名词→n.多样,变化万千
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 腐败行为, 渎职, 贪污, 盗用
stems_affixes.word_buile: mal坏+vers转+ation表名词→转坏了→做官做坏
perverse[adj.刚愎自用的,故意作对的]+ity表名词→n.刚愎,背理行为
trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌
uni一个+vers转+e→统一旋转,宇宙
universe[n.宇宙,万物]+ity表名词→由宇宙引申为知识,知识之地→大学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
stems_affixes.word_buile: versatile[adj.通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的]+ity表名词→n.多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
vers转+e→转着反复说的话
vers转+ion表名词→从原文转过来的→译文
diverse多样的+ify……化→v.使不同;[使]多样化
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

Sentence.sentence: And by the time she reached her late teens, she had written enough poetry to put together a slender book of verse.

sentences.en: He quotes a few verses from Tennyson in his paper.
sentences.cn: 他在论文中引用了英国诗人丁尼生的几行诗句。

jushi.english: She is the minor poet of our class, composing only ragged verses.
jushi.chinese: 她是我们班上的小诗人,只能作些打油诗。

jushi.english: He quotes a few verses from Tennyson in his paper.
jushi.chinese: 他在论文中引用了英国诗人坦尼森的几行诗句。

jushi.english: He expressed his ideas in verse.
jushi.chinese: 他用诗的形式来表达他的观点。
